requirement: "C-4-1] MUST have the AdbManager#isAdbWifiSupported() method return true. If device implementations support adb connections to a host machine via Wi-Fi and includes at least one camera, they: "
methods_string: @CddTest(requirement="6.1/C-1-1")     public void test_isadbWifiSupported() throws Exception {         boolean expected = hasFeature(FEATURE_WIFI);          CommandResult result = getDevice().executeShellV2Command("cmd adb is-wifi-supported");          Assert.assertTrue(new Integer(0).equals(result.getExitCode()));         Assert.assertEquals(expected, Boolean.parseBoolean(result.getStdout().trim()));     }

requirement: "C-4-1] MUST have the AdbManager#isAdbWifiSupported() method return true. If device implementations support adb connections to a host machine via Wi-Fi and includes at least one camera, they: "
methods_string: @CddTest(requirement="6.1/C-1-1")     public void test_isadbWifiSupported() throws Exception {         boolean expected = hasFeature(FEATURE_WIFI);          CommandResult result = getDevice().executeShellV2Command("cmd adb is-wifi-supported");          Assert.assertTrue(new Integer(0).equals(result.getExitCode()));         Assert.assertEquals(expected, Boolean.parseBoolean(result.getStdout().trim()));     }

requirement: "C-5-1] MUST have the AdbManager#isAdbWifiQrSupported() method return true. Dalvik Debug Monitor Service (ddms) "
methods_string: @CddTest(requirement="6.1/C-1-2")     public void test_isadbWifiQrSupported() throws Exception {         boolean expected = hasFeature(FEATURE_WIFI) && hasFeature(FEATURE_CAMERA_ANY);          CommandResult result = getDevice().executeShellV2Command("cmd adb is-wifi-qr-supported");          Assert.assertTrue(new Integer(0).equals(result.getExitCode()));         Assert.assertEquals(expected, Boolean.parseBoolean(result.getStdout().trim()));     } }
